2101680.name: good game
2101680.description:
some positive-good-karma-energy flowed out of control fromout some source - made flowers, plants, vegetables/fruits and insects grow bigger and come mad-happy-alive - some of them can hardly control this living-energy and stay restful-happy - you also got affected - can run faster and faster - blast energy-waves - and cant stop smiling and knowing how funny it all is - and feel drawn-forced-compelled to find out the source of this.

good game is a cartoony-2D-run&gun-action-platformer like mario and cuphead - yet lesser (few-healthpoints)fragile-porcelain-cup-gameplay - more can take some falls/hits like a mug + shooting/jumping on enemies/projectiles and getting extra-lifes(health), timing-predicting-estamating physics-trajectories and sometimes even a bit of good luck timing with the randomizers.

levels + (save at the) bosses
Depending on the difficulty selected, one receives a number of shots/lives(health) that one has to be wise with to reach (the save at) the boss with as many lives-health as possible - one gets full recharge of shots to shoot any projectile's fired by the boss + some life's can be earned at the boss in various ways.
(speed)run & gun levels
one is able to increase its speed also in the normal-levels on impact with enemies or projectiles the top-speed one has is reduced.
in the special-(speed)run & gun levels - if one reached a certain top-speed the base-speed increases to then eventually reach a certain top speed (to not have a hard-time) in the final part of the levels - which can go totally-mad-fast (since there isn't a top-speed).

new fun cartoony-enemies and bosses every level - mostly based on flowers, vegetables/fruits and insects that everyone knows.
unique over the top never seen before - enemies with run&gun-elements making it often better to run and gun - totally mad amounts of enemies and projectiles - 2D-platform-run&gun action that makes one - wonder if its not the right time to blast energy-waves and run instead of saving shots for when it might even gets more mad!!

funny (old-)cartoon sound effects and fun (old-)piano music

many levels accessable-playable from the map-level - multiple-difficulty modes that can be selected-changed per level - with each difficulty-mode great changes in the level - randomizers - with the enemies and the boss especially - besides the amount of health/shots at start and able to gain in the level - so its playable for both kids and for more experienced gamers and has greater-more-challenging replay value.
+ easy difficulty modes with many lives and shots
+ the difficulty mode - totally mad - in which one get one life and one shot more then the typical 3 with hard-mode and more hidden life's to gain in the levels.
